content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Setup at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron Processing Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) with inserter (position y1) that inserts iron ore
- Stone furnace (position x2) with inserter (position y2) that inserts iron ore
- Stone furnace (position x1) with inserter (position z1) that inserts coal
- Stone furnace (position x2) with inserter (position z2) that inserts coal

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is available for input before inserting items. Check if the furnace is already processing or if it has enough space.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when the furnace has finished processing. Check the status of the furnace before attempting to extract items.

### Errors when using stale entity data
- Regularly refresh or check the status of entities on the map to avoid working with outdated information. Use the appropriate commands to update entity data before performing actions.
